item.title: Gingerbread Cookies
item.description: Delicious, extremely soft gingerbread cookies with royal icing

item.title: Shepherd's Pie
item.description: A classic Shepherd’s Pie with a flavorful meat filling and creamy mashed potato topping

item.title: Classic Carrot Cake Cupcakes with a Cream Cheese Frosting
item.description: A delicious and moist carrot cake cupcake topped with a rich cream cheese frosting.

item.title: Giant Sugar Cookies
item.description: Delicious, HUGE sugar cookies topped with a creamy, sweet almond icing.

item.title: Anise Sugar Cookies
item.description: Delicious and buttery sugar cookies with a hint of vanilla and anise

item.title: Buttermilk Scones
item.description: Delicious and tender scones made with buttermilk and currants

item.title: Overnight Rolls
item.description: Soft and delicious rolls that rise overnight
